info.title: Invoice Product Manager
info.description: Manages products that are part of an invoice.

prop.name: valid
prop.description: Whether the invoice is valid with the current company and it is not closed.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Create a new instance of the invoice product manager.

parameter.name: $productID
parameter.description: The product id. Leave empty to add new products. It is empty by default.

method.name: create
method.description: Add a new product into the invoice. If you wish to change the product's info, call update().

parameter.name: $amount
parameter.description: The product amount. It is 1 by default.

parameter.name: $discount
parameter.description: The product discount, if any. This is value and not percentage over the total price (per 1 amount) after taxes. It is 0 by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure or if the product already exists in the invoice.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove a product from an invoice.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: update
method.description: Update a product into an invoice (amount, discount, price).

parameter.name: $amount
parameter.description: The product amount. It is 1 by default.

parameter.name: $discount
parameter.description: The product discount, if any. This is value and not percentage over the total price (per 1 amount) after taxes. It is 0 by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: info
method.returndescription: Invoice product info including title, amount, price, discount etc.

method.name: getAllProducts
method.returndescription: An array of all invoice product information.

method.name: validate
method.description: Validate whether the current invoice is owned by the current team.

parameter.name: $editable
parameter.description: Extra check whether the invoice is editable (not completed) or not.
